coreAttributes.name: electrical tape
coreAttributes.description: This shiny tape is of the sort that's typically used by electricians. Although it holds enough adhesive to stick to most surfaces, it isn't particularly strong, and could comfortably be stuck to skin, fur, or hair without fear of a painful removal.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off two long pieces of tape and [npc.verb(stick)] them over [npc.her] mouth.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off two long pieces of tape and [npc.verb(stick)] them over [npc2.namePos] mouth.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off two long pieces of tape and roughly [npc.verb(stick)] them over [npc2.namePos] mouth.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(wince)] and [npc2.verb(let)] out a cry as [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(rip)] the tape off [npc2.her] mouth.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off pieces of tape and [npc.verb(join)] them together into tape crosses, before sticking them over [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off pieces of tape and [npc.verb(join)] them together into tape crosses, before sticking them over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off pieces of tape and [npc.verb(join)] them together into tape crosses, before roughly sticking them over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples].

displacementText.otherRough: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(wince)] and [npc2.verb(let)] out a cry as [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(tear)] the tape crosses off [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples].

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off a piece of tape and [npc.verb(stick)] it over [npc.her] [npc.pussy+].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off a piece of tape and [npc.verb(stick)] it over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.pussy+].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off a piece of tape and roughly [npc.verb(stick)] it over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.pussy+].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wince)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(peel)] off the tape that was covering [npc.her] [npc.pussy+].
displacementText.other: [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(wince)] as [npc.name] [npc.verb(peel)] off the tape that was covering [npc2.namePos] [npc2.pussy+].
